name: isSpreadsheetFile
description: Checks if the input is a spreadsheet file or not

examples.title: Simple isSpreadsheetFile example
examples.description: Here we have simple example to check if the given file is a spreadsheet or not.
examples.code:
<form method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data">
	<input type="file" name="myfile" />
	<input type="submit" name="submit" value="submit">
</form>
<cfif structKeyExists(form, "submit")>
	<cfif isSpreadsheetFile(form.myfile)>
		<cffile action="upload" destination="#getTempDirectory()#" filefield="form.myfile" nameconflict="makeunique">
	</cfif>
</cfif>
